text: "Rich Flex" is a song off Canadian rapper Drake and American rapper 21 Savage's collaborative studio album Her Loss. The song was released on November 4, 2022. The song uses interpolations from the songs "Savage" by Megan Thee Stallion, "24's" by T.I., and "Red Opps" by 21 Savage. The song was able to reach #2 on the Billboard Hot 100 for three weeks. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Rich Flex" on YouTube Category:2022 songs Category:21 Savage songs Category:Drake (musician) songs
title: Rich Flex
